```{r}
library(tsibbledata)
library(tidyverse)
library(jsonlite)
pelt %>%
  select(-Hare) %>% 
  write_csv("lynx.csv")
```

```{r}
library(sugrrants)
library(lubridate)
library(jsonlite)
ve <- vic_elec %>%
  filter(year(Date) == "2013", month(Date) < 4) %>%
  select(Date, Time, Temperature, Demand) %>%
  split(.$Date) %>%
  map(~ as.data.frame(select(., -Date)))

names(ve) <- NULL
ve %>%
  write_json("electricity.json", simplifyVector = TRUE)

```
